title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5904.8 - Review of applications for financial support
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5904.8 - Review of applications for financial support

State Regulations
(a) An application for financial assistance
filed pursuant to section
5904.7
of this Part, when accepted
by the executive director as complete, shall be reviewed and evaluated by a
committee appointed by the chairman of the board. The committee's
recommendation, together with that of the executive director, shall be
forwarded by the executive director to the board. (b) No application for financial support
shall be deemed approved until it is approved by the board. (c) The executive director shall notify the
applicant of the board's approval or disapproval as soon as is possible after a
decision is reached by the board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5904.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
